text:
@WhiteHouse @PressSec @realDonaldTrump has been and is doing the best job that he could possibly could🙏🇺🇸
If I might add with VERY LITTLE assistance from the #Dems that decided to abandon ship! 🙄 
He is the BEST President! 🙂
#Trump 🇺🇸
#COVID19 🙏
#AmericaStrong 🇺🇸
